Description: An entity which modifies the gravity within it. The gravity is applied globally (it won't switch gravity back to normal after leaving it).

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Gravity factor, multiplied by the value of sv_gravity CVar.
Set name of {{ entname }}. Can be kill-targeted.

Notes: "Target", "Kill Target" and "Delay Before Trigger" keyvalues does not work on this entity. That means this trigger can't act like touch detectors (to fire it's target when touched).
